# Alchemist (Building)
## Overview
**Alchemist**

**Create** 48 Goods, 2 Influence, 41 Labor, 1 Magic (1,940 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Alchemy Lab (Room)|Alchemy Lab]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

The laboratory and home for a creator of potions, poisons, and alchemical items.
